lines.text: [after sex]
Why didn't we do this before?
Because it was always gonna be this hard to stop.
Do you want to be with me?
So much it hurts.
What we in the news business can never forget is that we are only as good as the stories we tell.
[Tally proposes marriage to Warren]
I want you around in the morning.
You already have me around in the morning. How, I don't know, but you do.
I want to know you're legally required to be there.
When I asked you how long you could stay and you said, 'Long enough,' how long is that? When we're not together...
...Everything shuts down.
Why don't you come with me?
I've already been where you're going.
Every day we have is one more than we deserve.
[Warren's advice about news headlines]
"If it bleeds, it leads."
I'm Sally, and I'm going to be a star.
She eats the lens.
Some people in this business get jaded because it's always the same awful stories. And it is the same stories - but they're happening to different people.
He's so stupid!
He's an anchorman.
Your voice is full of money.
do it this way, do it that way, do it MY way - until I don't even know how to do it without you.
